title: Lightning Connect!⚡️️
subtitle:
When lightning strikes, meetings happen!
Real-time connection for hobby gatherings!
problem0: Are you having problems with login/sign-up?
problem1: If you are unable to use Rayo due to sign-up or login errors, please check the following two things:
problem2: Check if you can log in to Rayo in a Wi-Fi environment.
problem3:
[Device Settings] > [RAYO] >
[Allow RAYO access - Cellular Data ON]
problem5: Send us an inquiry email, and we will resolve it quickly.
replyguide: We will reply to the email address you sent within 72 hours, excluding holidays.
defaultappnotavailable: Cannot use the default email app 😥
quickresponse: Please contact us at the email below for a quick response.
inquirycontent: [Inquiry] Please include the details of your inquiry.
emailcontent1: Please include [Phone number / Login method] so we can quickly check. Please describe the problem you experienced. You can also attach a screenshot capture.
termscontent:
Rayo protects your information safely.
Please agree to the terms below to create an account:
termsage: (Required) I am 14 years old or older.
termspersonal: (Required) Consent to the collection and use of personal information
phonecontent0: The verification code will be sent via text message. Your number will not be shared with others.
phonecontent1: After registering, you need to verify your email to use your existing account when reinstalling the app or logging in on another device.
sendcode: We have sent the verification code.
codecontent0:
If you use a carrier’s international text message blocking service,
you may not receive the verification message.
reject:
You cannot register with the information you entered.
Please try again.
enterbirth: Please enter your date of birth
correctCode: Please enter the correct verification code.
leavingRAYO: Are you leaving RAYO? That’s so sad 🥺
leavingReason: lease tell us why you’re leaving:
noMeetups: There are no meetups I’m interested in.
noMeetupsNear: There are no meetups near my location.
lacksFeatures: The app lacks features I want or is inconvenient to use.
disappointedPolicies: I’m disappointed with the operating policies.
reviewedGuidelines: I have reviewed the guidelines and agree to the terms.
deletedData:
Please make sure to review the following before deleting your account:

All activity data will be permanently deleted and anonymized.
Deleted data cannot be recovered.(e.g., clouds, name, profile, messages, wall posts, followers, participation history, etc.)
If you have any active subscriptions, you must cancel them through the App Store.
To prevent misuse, re-registration will not be possible for 30 days after account deletion.
personalOffer: Get personalized offers and event updates via app push notifications or SMS.
meetType: What type of meet-up is this?
joinMeet: What type of meet-up do you want to join?
cloudUseInfo:
You will use {cloudCount}Cloud
when entering a desired meet-up room!
numberRegistered: The phone number is already registered!
willBeDeleted: If you register a new account with this number, all previous usage history and purchased cloud will be deleted, and you will be automatically logged out from the previous device. You can log in to the new device with your previous usage history intact by entering the verified email address.
sameNumberDeleted: When you register a new account with the same number, all previous information will be deleted.
agreedReceiveMarketing: You have agreed to receive marketing information.
missOutImportantUpdates: You might miss out on important updates!
offNotificationsInfo: If you turn off notifications now, you may miss out on various benefits and news.
datetimeAgreeNotify: We will notify you of various benefits and updates starting from {dateTime}.
datetimeDisagreeNotify: You have withdrawn your consent to receive marketing information on {dateTime}.
blockedFriendsInfo:
Blocked friends cannot view each other’s Meetups, chat rooms, or walls (reviews).
Blocked friends will not be notified that they have been blocked.
areSureCancelParticipation: Are you sure you want to cancel your participation?
SearchLocation: Search for a location or area!
e.gTitle: e.g., For those who are passionate about coffee and cafes
HowManyRecruit: How many participants are you recruiting? (including yourself)
LeaveReviewMeetup: Leave a review for the meetup you attended.
RegisterEmail: Register your email to use this feature.
shopNotes2:
The right of withdrawal is available within 7 days of purchase if the product has not been used.
However, once the product is provided or used, the right of withdrawal is restricted.
shopNotes3: Payments made using a minor's payment method without the consent of a legal guardian may be canceled.
enoughClouds: You don't have enough Clouds! Please purchase more.
wanttoblock: Do you want to block this friend?
wanttodelete: Do you want to delete this user?
disappearfromReconnecting: If you delete them, they will disappear from Reconnecting.
14yearsold: Appears to be an account under 14 years old
hidethispostorchatroom: Hide this post or chat room
wanttoblockthisuser: Are you sure you want to block this user?
registeryouremail: Please register your email before using this feature.
blockfriendinfo:
If you block a friend, all messages will be blocked, and they will be removed from your friends list. (They will not be notified of the block.)

You can unblock them in [Settings > Blocked Friends List].
genderselectedClouds:
For each match with your selected gender, 
 {cloudCount} Clouds will be used!
hidethispostAllchatroomName: Hide all posts or chat rooms from {name}
